post.body: IT WAS--ANDY TALKED ABOUT HIS DICK. THIS WAS A GOOD RESULT.
WUBBA WUBBA
Oh, god, I remember that--I remember the backgrounds and animations scaring the fuck out of me.
Are you kidding me? Holeeee SHIT, that's kind of amazing. Kind of fucked up, but kind of -wow- at the same time.
lmao I love the Hard Gay bento animation too, I'm sure I've got that somewhere around here...
I have no clue but it's something about porn. And his dick. Being huge. XD XD XD
I'd rather blow Patrick. :/
ikr? Listening to it now I really want to do some art. But I am lazy and am working on stuff in googledocs instead rn.
OK DUDE. When you get better and can sing again you need to come to Flagstaff. We will throw you a damn PARTY.
That would rock. :D
That's a tough one. Maybe a Billy Joel/Patrick Stump collaboration.
omg I kno~ HI
He's really kinda cute, too. I think it will be okay.
I hope so too, or I'll have his fucking HEAD ON A SPIKE. YOU DON'T FUCK UP GAMBIT. YOU JUST DON'T.
O I know him. I met him back in February. HOLY SHI
YUO HORR.
I am still trying to catch up on news of the day but WHO WAS CAST AS GAMBIT~ do you know?
FJSKLDJFLKSDJFLSOIFJLKJWUOIFUJOJVOUJOVFJMAL~ GAMBIT~
WHAT ABOUT GAMBIT
Been thinking about you all morning, Andy. I hope todays been a lot kinder to you. :-)
lol Slot Music. I remember reading about this a few months ago. I love my plastic discs but I love my tech advancement!
I wish I could find my words when I talk about the album, man, I really do. I'd write up a review to make you smile.
I HOPE YOU HAVE A MOTHERFUCKIN GOOD ONE
Awww, Bob, thank you! You too!
Happy holidays, guys. ♥
Also: http://i2.photobucket.com/albums/y29/angrycargo/pornstache.jpg
It'd be fantastic to see the film at the Orpheum before it closes up next spring but they're booked up until then.
Flagstaff only does its film festival in October, but during the summer there's "Movies on the Square" downtown.
That's fucking LAME. Please be careful. ♥
Hi there!! OMNOMNOM.
LMFAO oh lord, to have our innermost internet secrets divulged to the men who are the focus of the attention! SOMEONE PIMP PATRICKS_BELLY.
LMAO someone told Andy about porn? What? I just read his comment about his dick and I fucking LOST IT. I'm so confused and cannot breathe!
BROTHER NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO
ALSO: HARD GAY. http://tinyurl.com/6dh5sa
My mother always told me to quit playing on the floor and I should have listened to her. :-/
A few months of scrubbing my childhood off of my knees with ground oatmeal, honey, lemon juice in the shower, I can see the difference. Yay!
bbl, work.
come together, come apart, only get lonely when you're reading the charts...
brb blowing off steam; don't let the doctor in, plz.
re: The FAD collector's edition. Why aren't the other editions packaged as such? I'm confused. You want to go green, go all the way.
We have 9 inches of it -so far-. D: And I have a LOT of things I need to do today
Holy shit, snow. D:
FUCK YES. HE-MAN AND THE MASTERS OF THE UNIVERSE IS ON HULU.

a half on my car. :C I'M SO HAPPY I HAVE TOMORROW OFF.
OH MY FUCK. We're expected to get 2 feet of snow accumulation before the end of tomorrow. Got off of work and there was already an inch and
omg snow. dnw.
LET MY PEOPLE GO ALL IN: http://tinyurl.com/5t5tud LOL
Omg 2nd largest snowfall in flagstaffs recorded history. 6 businesses have had their roofs collapse today.
that fanart post is now a spam post. GET TO IT. PLEASE.
Wow, Fall Out Boy/The Lion King fanart. The internet confuses me a lot.
lol wow David Spade just helped the PHX police dept. buy 50 high-powered rifles. Pretty awesome.
I got taxed like FUCK this paycheck though, ugh. I will be able to pay rent, easy, though and that is great. Wheeee!
OMG I -did- get my bonus check this period. Sometimes I wonder if my DDO does shit like that to stress me. It worked. :C
>:C WARREN ELLIS GOT FUCKED FOR CHRISTMAS.
I'LL SHOW HIM HOW TO FUCK A TAMALE~
